content: As you mentioned #3 button labels must be clear and use verbs, I agree. I apply myself the button labels must be the answers to “Would you like to ______verbs_____ ?” question. For example, “Would you like to delete the item? Then the answers would be (2 buttons) “Cancel” and “Delete.” The affirmation is on the right and dismissing of the modal button is on the left. (at least on iOS and Android) A caveat is here, “Would you like to cancel this process?”In this case, you cannot put 2 “Cancel” buttons… Oops. You have to be aware of it. I also feel strange with an “OK” button especially with “Cancel” button.“What “OK”?
